src/test/resources/features/EnrollmentOn.feature_name: To Test PNC Bank Enrollment Functionality with Invalid details

steps.text: User Launches the PNC Bank application
User clicks on the Sign On button
User clicks on the Enroll In Online Banking button
Verify that the user is on the enrollment page
User selects the SSN radio button and enters the PAN Account Number "<SSN>"
User enters the PAN Account Number "<PanAccountNumberOPanNumber>"
User selects the PNC Debit Card PIN radio button and enters the PNC debit card pin "<DebitCardPin>"
User clicks on the next button
Verify that the application shows an appropriate warning message on the UI

src/test/resources/features/LoginToOnlin.scenario_name: Verify Login Functionality with Invalid Credential

steps.text: User Launches the PNC Bank application
User clicks on the Sign On button
User enters username and password
User clicks on login button
Shows warning or error on UI
